We‚Äôve seen average D2C brands explode on the back of smart digital distribution (content + community + paid performance), while brilliant products remain invisible because nobody discovered them.

The internet rewards distribution-first thinking. If you can build reach, feedback loops will shape the product faster than perfection ever could.
